name: UProgressBar
doc:
The progress bar widget is a simple bar that fills up that can be restyled to fit any number of uses.

* No Children

BarFillType: Defines the direction in which the progress bar fills
BarFillStyle: Defines the visual style of the progress bar fill - scale or mask
bIsMarquee: Sets the progress bar to show as a marquee.
Percent: Used to determine the fill position of the progress bar ranging 0..1

methods.name: SetFillColorAndOpacity
methods.doc: Sets the fill color of the progress bar.

methods.name: SetIsMarquee
methods.doc: Sets the progress bar to show as a marquee.

methods.name: SetPercent
methods.doc: Sets the current value of the ProgressBar.
